thread.title_full: Senior Program Director - Sports - Wichita - Sports and Fitness

title: Senior Program Director - Sports - Wichita - Sports and Fitness
text: Posted/Updated: 10-19-2015 Brief Job Description: Responsibilities include the safety, leadership, management, and supervision of the Recreational Sports Leadership. Assist the Sports Department in the supervision of all recreational sports programs ensuring that character development, family components, and volunteer development are integrated.   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
